resources.string: * Emergency contact 2 and 3 are optional fields
Note: Please keep GPS ON \nwhen Protection mode is ON !
Shake the device up and down 3 times to send an SOS signal
Required for app to function in the background
This permission is required to access Locaton service on your device.

Allows the app to access this device\'s location in background. Necessary for the app to function.\n\n Note: If tapping the below button does not open the permissions dialog, manually provide permission by going to app permission settings and selecting \"Allow all the time\" for location permisssion
SMS permission is required to send SMS to your selected emergency contacts.
Allows the app to run in background.
